revision.text:
[[File:Catedral de la Inmaculada Concepción.JPG|thumb|Cathedral of Immaculate Conception in Matehuala]] '''Matehuala''' it is the second most important city in the state [[Mexico|Mexican]] [[States of Mexico|state]] of [[San Luis Potosí]]. It is located at around {{coord|23|39|10|N|100|38|40|W |region:MX-SLP_type:city |display=inline,title}}, at an elevation of about 1,500 m. Matehuala is also the municipal seat of the [[municipalities of Mexico|municipality]] of the same name, located in the northern part of the state, on the border with the southwestern corner of [[Nuevo León]]. The city of Matehuala population is of 176,876. The municipality has an area of {{convert|1286.66|km2|abbr=on}}.
==Notable people== *[[Juan José Ortega]] - film director and producer (1904–1996) ==Notable buildings== * [[Immaculate Conception Cathedral, Matehuala]] has the same architectural style as [[Saint Joseph des Brotteaux]], in Lyon, France. Its construction started in 1898 and was never finished.
* Iglesia Santísima de Guadalupe
==See also== *[[Immaculate Conception Cathedral, Matehuala]]
==References== *[https://www.webcitation.org/6EjXaEdST?url=http://www.inegi.gob.mx/est/contenidos/espanol/sistemas/conteo2005/localidad/iter/ Link to tables of population data from Census of 2005] INEGI: Instituto Nacional de Estadística, Geografía e Informática *[https://web.archive.org/web/20070401165115/http://www.e-local.gob.mx/wb2/ELOCAL/EMM_sanluispotosi San Luis Potosí] Enciclopedia de los Municipios de México
